elements.text:
During today's meeting, you have to present in front of your colleagues and boss. You've been struggling to put this presentation together, but you haven't reached out to your boss about it yet. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I feel better knowing that colleagues are going through the same thing I am.
I feel happy that the presentation will be over with soon.
I feel bad that I may not do as well on this presentation, but it's only one small part of my entire professional career.
I am nervous that my boss will be let down by my progress.
I feel embarrassed about asking my boss for help, but I admire my confidence for putting myself out there.
